titleStmt.title: Certain prayers and graces newly added, to be used of scholars, both before and after noon / compiled by R.C.
titleStmt.author: Crowley, Robert, 1518?-1588.

notesStmt.note: Certain prayers and graces were compiled by Robert Crowley and included in Francis Seager's "The schoole of vertue." The names of Seager and Crowley appear on verso of t.p. of 1677 edition. Cf. BM.
Place and date of publication from BM.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
